 2008-06212008-04-03,  ,  JUS,  , 
ActFederal Courts Act
PrecisOrder directing that COMMISSIONS do issue empowering 2 officers of the OFFICE OF THE COMMUNICATIONS SECURITY ESTABLISHMENT COMMISSIONER to administer oaths and to take and receive affidavits, declarations and affirmations within or outside of Canada, in respect of any matter in relation to the Communications Security Establishment Commissioner.
